author: Special Correspondent
text:
With the Mahamaham fast approaching, Kumbakonam Municipality officials shifted gears on removing encroachments especially those blocking traffic movement in narrow lanes and by-lanes of the temple town.

Officials on Sunday demolished and removed some old buildings and shrines in the town.

At Thiruvalanchuzhi area, an old Vinayakar shrine was pulled down and the debris removed. Three encroached buildings abutting the shrine were demolished in the presence of Kumbakonam Deputy Superintendent of Police Sivabhaskar and tahsildar Prabhakaran.In the Bhaktapuri Street in Kumbakonam, two encroachments near the Cauvery bathing ghat were removed during the day.

Similarly, in the Tiruthuraipoondi area of the neighbouring Tiruvarur district, officials removed some encroachments on the banks of Nallaru near the Korukkai Kannan Medu region following a verdict by the Madras High Court.
title: Kumbakonam municipality demolishes encroachments
